mapper.select: SELECT b.id modelId, b.html_content htmlContent, b.html_js_content htmlJsContent FROM sm_project_page_mode a, rm_group_member b WHERE a.sm_project_page_id = #{pageId} AND a.rm_group_member_id = b.id ORDER BY a.sort ASC
mapper.insert:
insert into sm_project_page_mode (id, rm_group_member_id, sm_project_page_id, sort, create_id, create_time) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.modelId}, #{item.pageId}, #{item.sort}, #{item.createId}, #{item.createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.title, b.property_tag propertyTag, b.property_out propertyOut, b.property_unit propertyUnit, b.html_content htmlContent, b.js_content jsContent, b.js_rely_on jsRelyOn, b.wether_sel_child_data selChildData, c.template_content templateContent FROM rm_group_member_property a, rm_property b LEFT JOIN ds_form_display_template c ON c.id = b.ds_form_display_template_id WHERE a.member_id = #{id} AND b.id = a.property_id
SELECT a.id, a.property_value name FROM rm_property_value a WHERE a.property_id = #{id}

SELECT a.id, a.`name`, IF(ISNULL(a.file_path) || LENGTH(TRIM(a.file_path)) < 1, a.default_file_path, a.file_path) filePath, IF(ISNULL(a.file_name) || LENGTH(TRIM(a.file_name)) < 1, a.default_file_name, a.file_name) fileName, IF(ISNULL(a.file_path) || LENGTH(TRIM(a.file_path)) < 1, a.default_file_path, a.file_path) parentId FROM sm_project_page a WHERE a.id = #{pageId}
